programme.desc: Naruto: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada
programme.sub-title: A Dcima Pergunta Ou Tudo Ou Nada

programme.desc: Naruto: A Prova Chunin Segunda Etapa A Floresta Da Morte
programme.sub-title: A Prova Chunin Segunda Etapa A Floresta Da Morte

programme.desc: Naruto: Comer Ou Ser Comido - Pnico Na Floresta
programme.sub-title: Comer Ou Ser Comido - Pnico Na Floresta

programme.desc: Naruto: O Contra-Ataque De Naruto, Nunca Se Renda!
programme.sub-title: O Contra-Ataque De Naruto, Nunca Se Renda!

programme.sub-title: O Sharingan Revivido: Jutsu Chama Do Drago

programme.sub-title: A Promessa Do "Sobrancelhudo": Amor Eterno E Proteo

programme.desc: Naruto: Sakura Floresce

programme.desc: Naruto: Formao De Batalha: Ino-Shika-Cho

programme.sub-title: Akamaru Treme: A Fora Cruel De Gaara

programme.sub-title: O Segredo Do Pergaminho, No Permitido Olhar

programme.sub-title: Clone Contra Clone: Os Meus So Melhores Que Os Seus

programme.sub-title: Sobrevivendo Ao Corte: Os Nove Novatos Juntos Outra Vez

programme.sub-title: Estreitando O Campo, Morte Sbita, Eliminao!

programme.desc: Naruto: Batalha Byakugan: Hinata Ganha Coragem!

programme.sub-title: Gaara Conta Rock Lee, O Poder Da Juventude Explode

programme.sub-title: A Fora Oculta De Lee: Um Jutsu Secreto Proibido

programme.desc: Marley trabalha para a mfia cobrando dividas. Quando uma de suas visitas da errado e ele acidentalmente mata uma mulher, o criminoso acaba preso e com um grande sentimento de culpa. Em busca de redeno, Marley decide cuidar da filha da mulher que matou.

programme.title: Redeno, (2013, Action)

programme.title: O Rei das Armas, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Um criminoso se rene com um velho amigo aps uma troca de armas fracassada.

programme.sub-title: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!

programme.desc: Dentro de uma nvoa pesada, os ninjas da folha tentam achar o naruto. A equipe aumenta a guarda quando fica sabendo que a nvoa que cerca o lago causa iluses.

programme.desc: Naruto entra na nvoa para procurar yukimaru. Guren fica alerta para proteger yukimaru, cuja situao atual o impede de se mexer.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Barreira De Selamento De Quatro Pontas

programme.desc: Para proteger a barreira de selamento de quatro pontas necessria para selar a besta de trs caudas, kakashi e naruto enfrentar uma mortal batalha contra guren

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Camelia Vermelha
programme.desc: Para proteger guren da raivosa trs caudas, yukimaru usa poderes alm de seus limites. Comovida pela gesto dele, guren lamenta pelo seu pecado no passado de ter matado a me de yukimaru

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Estranhos Companheiros

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Caminho Das Camlias

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Contra Ataque Da Marca Da Maldio
programme.desc: Apesar da tentativa de salvamento, naruto e guren no retornam. A frustrao aumenta entre o grupo, mas quando a besta de trs caudas desperta de seu sono, a equipe de selamento faz uma segunda tentativa com a barreira de selamento de quatro pontas.
programme.sub-title: O Contra Ataque Da Marca Da Maldio

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Lugar Para Retornar
programme.desc: Os ninjas da folha esto tratando seus ferimentos. A batalha deixou todos com srios ferimentos. Shizune examina yuukimaru, que est em coma, mas seu corpo no mais capaz de controlar a trs caudas.

programme.title: O Homem com a Morte nos Olhos, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Na cidade de Hard Times, um estranho cavalga e aterroriza o pequeno povoado. Ele mata vrios habitantes da cidade, incluindo Fee, o fundador da cidade.

programme.title: Santo Antonio: Cidade sem Lei, (1946, Western)
programme.desc: 1877, sudoeste do Texas. Milhares de cabeas de gado eram empurradas para o norte do estado, sem que haja controle algum.

programme.title: Meu Nome Ningum, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: O honesto advogado Black Jack Gideon envolve-se na procura de um valioso e raro pnei japons, que foi sequestrado, e por quem o bando de desertores renegados exige uma fabulosa quantia de resgate.

programme.title: Renegado Impiedoso, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: Pardon Chato um ndio Apache mestio que vive na linha entre duas culturas, balanceando a sua tribo com o encantamento que tem pelo mundo dos brancos.

programme.title: Os Abutres Tm Fome, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Nesta aventura desenfreada e anrquica que se desenrola no Mxico do sculo XIX, o mercenrio americano Hogan salva a freira Sara dos seus pretensos molestadores.

programme.title: A Marca Rubra, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Choya, um pistoleiro de moral distorcida, convencido por Leffingwell a se passar pelo filho do rancheiro Richard Lavery, que est desaparecido h vinte e cinco anos e, com isso, possa herdar a fortuna de sua famlia.

programme.title: Interligados, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um homem, que se culpa pela morte da sua filha nica, retorna cidade onde o fatdico acidente ocorreu. L, ele conhece uma bela e misteriosa mulher. Ambos sentem-se atrados um pelo outro, mas ela tambm carrega um passado sombrio.

programme.title: Original Gangster, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Conhea a diferente vida de Castor: rfo quando criana, forado a sobreviver no deserto, at crescer e chegar a Londres, onde se tornou um dos principais chefes do submundo do crime.

programme.title: O Assassino do Central Park, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Seis melhores amigos do ensino mdio se renem para uma noite de diverso no Central Park. O que eles ainda no sabem que um assassino mascarado est solta no local, apenas esperando para colocar o seu plano de vingana em prtica.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivncia, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma histria real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: Armadas e Perigosas, (2017, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Quando um vigarista tenta passar a perna nessas quatro avs, elas acidentalmente o matam.

programme.title: Todo Mundo Ama Minha Me, (2018, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Uma dupla de me e filho so inadvertidamente despachados em um continer de Londres para o Marrocos com nada alm de seus pijamas. A aventura os leva pela Espanha e Frana em uma jornada para voltar para casa e reconstruir seu relacionamento rochoso.

programme.title: Crimes Obscuros, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: O policial Tadek investiga um caso de assassinato no resolvido e encontra semelhanas do crime em um livro do artista polons Krystov Kozlow. Ele comea a investigar a vida do escritor e da sua namorada, uma mulher misteriosa que trabalha num sex club.

programme.title: O Muro, (2020, Foreign Drama)
programme.desc: Filmado durante 10 dias em um local ativo de travessia a 30 milhas ao norte da fronteira mexicana, O Muro a histria de uma amizade incomum entre uma imigrante sem documentos.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmo criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor pblico.

programme.title: Maldita Aranha Assassina, (2013, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: A cidade de Los Angeles tem um grande problema pela frente. Uma aranha gigante acaba de escapar de um laboratrio e est aterrorizando os moradores da cidade.

programme.title: Orao Diablica, (2020, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: Quatro viajantes so perseguidos pela maligna irm Monday, uma lendria freira que matou diversas pessoas quando viva.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubaro de 6 Cabeas, (2018, Creature Features)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivncia quando um tubaro de 6 cabeas comea a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: Tubares de Gelo, (2016, Supernatural Sci-Fi)
programme.desc: Uma nova raa de tubares vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estao de pesquisa do rtico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contgio, (2005, Zombies)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalao aps a liberao de uma bactria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituio psiquitrica encontra um velho tubo de vcuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactrias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: A Bonequinha da Mame, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: Clepatra sai de casa para mais um dia de trabalho. Aps passar por vrias situaes embaraosas, ela acaba indo visitar sua me no asilo, onde a chegada de uma boneca antiga vai mudar sua vida para sempre.

programme.title: A Van Assassina, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: Laurinho casado com a ex-prostituta Cleusa, ele no sabe que seu bilhete de loteria premiado poder ser sua maior maldio. Especialmente quando Cleusa e a amiga Shirley resolverem ficarem com o dinheiro s para elas.

programme.title: Entre Mortos e Vivos, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: Uma turma de serial killers confinada num manicmio judicirio se prepara para a festa de dia das bruxas, quando chega uma nova interna, Heloisa, despertando o interesse de Lucas. Claudia apaixonada por Lucas e quer dar um fim no romance entre os dois.

programme.title: A percepo do Medo, (2016, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A crise existncial, os terrores internos de quem vive na metrpole. Marcus no tem a vida que imaginou, seus fracassos, a constante presso de seus medos o levam a beira de sua sanidade.

programme.title: Morgue Story: Sangue, Baiacu e Quadrinhos, (2010, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: Ana Argento (Mariana Zannete), uma desenhista de quadrinhos de sucesso, mas frustrada com seus relacionamentos, se encontra com outros dois personagens solitrios e com vidas curiosas.

programme.title: Mar Negro, (2013, Monsters)
programme.desc: Uma estranha contaminao atinge uma pequena vila de pescadores. Quando peixes e crustceos se transformam em horrendas criaturas transmissoras de morte e destruio.

programme.title: Perseguio Explosiva, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Um dubl se envolve acidentalmente em crimes envolvendo relquias misteriosas e agora precisa lutar para sobreviver ao longo de uma srie de aventuras perigosas e incrveis.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da mfia japonesa suspeita de ser vtima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: O Monge Prova de Balas, (2020, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma histria em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a histria de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliao, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que no voltaria para a Tailndia, mas algum o seda e o fora a retornar ao pas asitico.

programme.title: A Lenda do Mestre Chins, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: A histria do filme baseada em uma lenda chinesa e gira em torno de um jovem estudante (Raymond Lam) que se apaixona por uma bela mulher (Huang Shengyi), sem saber que ela uma cobra branca que assumiu a forma humana.

programme.title: Mscara Negra, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um heri mascarado.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capito da polcia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man perseguido por um gngster vingativo, enquanto o exrcito japons invade a regio.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingana do drago, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendrio lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmo de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingana.

programme.title: O Matador - Misso Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele est cuidando sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Samurai X - O Inferno De Kyoto, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Kenshin Himura vai contra o puro mal Makoto Shishio que est tentando derrubar o governo Meiji. O destino do pas est em jogo quando Kenshin Himura pega a espada que ele jurou nunca mais sacar.

programme.title: The Pit and the Pendulum, (1961, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Vincent Price slowly goes crazy because he thinks his wife was buried alive (a plot between his wife and her lover to get his money). Now totally insane, he starts to murder.

programme.title: The Night of the Hunter, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum stars in an unforgettable role as a psychopathic preacher in the relentless pursuit of two children who have their dead father's stolen fortune hidden in a doll. Shelley Winters co-stars.

programme.title: The Vikings, (1958, Thriller)
programme.desc: Legends Kirk Douglas, Tony Curtis, Ernest Borgnine and Janet Leigh dazzle in this epic chronicle of brutal rivalry and bloodthirsty ambition as two brothers are locked in a battle that will decide their fate...and that of a beautiful princess.

programme.title: The Life And Death Of Colonel Blimp, (1943, War Drama)
programme.desc: From the Boer War through World War II, a soldier rises through the ranks in the British military.

programme.title: Birdman Of Alcatraz, (1962, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Burt Lancaster stars in the true story of killer Robert Stroud, who spent 43 years in solitary confinement at Alcatraz, and who educated himself, becoming a world renowned authority on birds. Thelma Ritter, Telly Savalas and Karl Malden co-star.

programme.title: Sweet Smell of Success, (1957, Crime)
programme.desc: A columnist and a press agent tear into the maelstrom of midtown Manhattan's night creatures in a sinister game that involves money, power and ultimately survival.

programme.title: The Defiant Ones, (1958, Thriller)
programme.desc: In Stanley Kramer's cinema classic, screen legends Sidney Poitier and Tony Curtis star as two convicts on the run from a Southern work gang who are bound together by an unbreakable iron chain and separated by an unbridled hatred for each other.

programme.title: Lilies of the Field, (1963, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Nominated for 5 Academy Awards including Best Picture and winner of the Best Actor Oscar for Sidney Poitier for his role as an itinerant handyman who stops to help five impoverished nuns and the small Arizona desert town in which they reside.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: Showdown at the Grand, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: A proud movie theater owner must defend his family business from corporate developers alongside a legendary action star as art imitates life in a showdown for the ages.

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: Armored, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: A crew of officers at an armored transport security firm embark on the ultimate heist against their own company. The seemingly fool-proof plan soon proves to be useless when an unexpected witness interferes, as the plan quickly unravels.

programme.title: The Raid: Redemption, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Jakarta's slums lies a drug-gangs safe house, home to some of the most terrifying and ruthless fighters in the city. Arriving before dawn, an elite swat team moves in to take down the notorious drug lord that runs it.

programme.title: The Raid 2 (Subtitled), (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Following immediately after the events of THE RAID, Rama (Iko Uwais) is forced to reinvent himself as an undercover cop in order to provide protection for his wife and child.

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: Hustle & Flow, (2005, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The tale of DJay, a pimp whose hustle selling sexy Nola leaves him wondering if this is it for him. Only when he trades contraband for a keyboard and bumps into his old schoolfriend Key does he see a way out by laying down some tracks.

programme.title: New Jack City, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Wesley Snipes stars as Nino Brown, an American success story with a twist. He's young, handsome, smart, rich, and prominent in his community.

programme.title: 187, (1997, Crime)
programme.desc: When a student writes the police code for homicide, 187, inside a textbook owned by teacher Trevor Garfield, he feels threatened.

programme.title: Posse, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: There's action galore in this off-beat western that features a group of mostly black infantrymen who return from the Spanish-American War with a cache of gold. The men travel to the West where their leader searches for the men who lynched his father.

programme.title: Hoodlum, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: 1930's New York. The black community of Harlem faces the same indignities as countless millions of refugees. If the seeds of Harlem's urban power would not grow in the White city, the Black underground would form to take control.

programme.title: The Legend 2, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: The Cantonese hero Fong Sai Yuk becomes involved in the secret brotherhood "The Red Flower", who are trying to overthrow the Manchurian emperor and re-establishing the Ming dynasty.

programme.title: Legend of the Red Dragon, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: A young father and his infant son are beset by forces of evil and corruption. They wander China, upholding their sense of honor and protecting the weak. When they are forced into combat, spectacular and hilarious fast-motion kung fu sequences follow.

programme.title: Badges of Fury, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: In just 3 days, three cases of Smiling Murder shock Hong Kong. The young detective Wang Bu'er and his buddy Huang Feihong embark on an investigation full of excitement and unexpected events.

programme.title: Flying Swords Of Dragon Gate, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: A Ming Dynasty freedom fighter (Jet Li), a female warrior (Zhou Xun) and a corrupt eunuch (Kun Chen) are among those who converge on a remote desert hostel that sits atop a city of treasures.

programme.title: The Warlords, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: In the midst of the Taiping Rebellion of the 1860s, three men take an oath to become \\"blood brothers,\\" pledging loyalty to one another until death, but soon become embroiled in a web of political deceit.

programme.title: True Legend, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Su Qi-Er retired from his life as a renowned Qing dynasty general in order to pursue his dream of a family and his own martial arts school.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is at it again with his newest action-packed and comedic martial-arts adventure, KUNG FU HUSTLE. Rated: R

programme.title: Iron Monkey, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Presented by Quentin Tarantino, Iron Monkey is the spirited tale of a mysterious and mythical Chinese legend in this exhilarating non-stop martial arts excitement.

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An epic set against the breathtaking landscapes of ancient China, Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon combines the exhilarating martial arts choreography by Yuen Wo-Ping with the sensitivity and classical storytelling of an Ang Lee film.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III, (1993, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Eddie's back! So are the laughs. Eddie Murphy returns as Detroit cop Axel Foley, getting down with the fun-and-sun set as never before in this revved up thrill-ride of a movie.

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: As the vampire Maximillian, the popular star is the most diabolical, dashing and definitely undead dude in the hood.

programme.title: Airplane!, (1980, Comedy)
programme.desc: Voted one of the 10 funniest movies ever made by the American Film Institute, Airplane! is a masterpiece of off-the-wall comedy.

programme.title: The Big Hit, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Lou Diamond Phillips, Mark Wahlberg, Christina Applegate, Antonio Sabato Jr. and Lela Rochon star in this story of a hitman who kidnaps the teenage child of his boss.

programme.title: Jawbreaker, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: "The beautiful ones. The flawless four. Everyone wanted to be them. You know 'em". First there's Courtney "Satan-in-heels" Shayne and her pawn, the dense but dangerous Marcie Fox, a legend in her own little mind. Rated: R

programme.title: The Wood, (1999, Romance)
programme.desc: Lots of guys have second thoughts about marriage. Three hours before his wedding, Roland is having third, fourth and fifth thoughts. Good thing hes got buddies Slim and Mike around to help.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Good Burger, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: Kel are serving up laughs! They're the good guys in Good Burger, a zany comedy inspired by the popular Kel routine from Nickelodeon's hit series All That.

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Angel Eyes, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: After meeting under extraordinary life-and-death circumstances, a Chicago police officer (Lopez) and a lost soul named Catch (Caviezel) fall in love. While uncovering the truth about Catch, she is forced to deal with the secrets of her own past. Rated-R

programme.title: The Other Boleyn Girl, (2008, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Two sisters, Anne and Mary, are driven by their ambitious family to seduce the king of England in order to advance their position in court. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments, (2013, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Clary's life is turned upside down when her mother is kidnapped and it's revealed that they are shadowhunters who are tasked with protecting the world from vampires, werewolves and demons. Clary must discover her talents and save her mother.

programme.title: My Blueberry Nights, (2007, Romance)
programme.desc: A young woman takes a soul-searching journey across America to resolve her questions about love while encountering a series of offbeat characters along the way.

programme.title: A Guy Thing, (2003, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Paul (Jason Lee) is a good guy. When his friends throw him a wild bachelor party, he's shocked when he wakes up in bed with a beautiful girl named Becky (Julia Stiles) and can't remember the night before. She also happens to be his fiancee's cousin.

programme.title: Kate and Leopold, (2001, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: When a rip in time brings together a charming 19th-century bachelor and a thoroughly 21st-century woman, the potential for an old-fashioned modern romance ignites!

programme.title: Best Men, (1999, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Luke Wilson and Sean Patrick Flannery star in this hilarious action-comedy wherein Drew Barrymore is a young woman determined to have the perfect wedding day, despite the fact that the groomsmen have decided to rob the local bank.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Panic Room, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: When her home is invaded by three armed robbers, a divorced woman and her young daughter hide in their specially designed panic room but end up in a deadly cat-and-mouse game anyway.

programme.title: Single White Female, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: SWF seeks female to share apt in West 70s. Non-smoker, professional preferred. An innocent want ad opens the door to murderous, unrelenting terror in this pulse-pounding psychological shocker starring Bridget Fonda and Jennifer Jason Leigh. Rated: R

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Eagle Eye, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Shia LaBeouf and Michelle Monaghan star as two strangers trying to escape danger when they are ripped from their ordinary lives and 'activated' as part of a hightech assassination plot.

programme.title: Predestination, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.

programme.title: Thunderheart, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit, (2014, Thriller)

programme.title: Footloose, (1984, Romance)
programme.desc: A rebellious city boy finds himself in an uptight Midwestern town where dancing and therefore all youthful joy has been banned.

programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: Comes a Horseman, (1978, Western)
programme.desc: Set in the American West of the 1940s, a pair of little-guy ranchers join forces against the depredations of a ruthless land baron determined to expand his empire at whatever cost. Starring Jane Fonda, James Caan, and Jason Robards.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: The Return of A Man Called Horse, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Richard Harris stars in this superior sequel which follows the plight of a horribly wronged tribe of Sioux Indians and the white man who would join in their revenge.

programme.title: The Halliday Brand, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: A western about a young man's (Joseph Cotten) disillusionment with his father (Ward Bond), a corrupt sheriff. When his dad turns away from the lynching of his sister's lover, the boy rebels and his father declares him an 'outlaw.'

programme.title: Rancho Deluxe, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: Jack (Jeff Bridges) and Cecil (Sam Waterston) are an oddball team of modern-day Montana cattle rustlers, and theyve set their sights on a pair of unlikely ranch owners from New York (Clifton James, Elizabeth Ashley). But can they outfox the foxes?

programme.title: Heaven's Gate, (1981, Western)
programme.desc: This ambitious frontier epic features a lawman (Kris Kristofferson) and a hitman (Christopher Walken) who fight in a tragic class war between ranchers and starving immigrants.

programme.title: Wild Bill, (1995, Western)
programme.desc: Wild Bill focuses on the last days of gunfighter, Wild Bill Hickok, consorting in Deadwood with Calamity Jane, observed by a longtime friend, and haunted by the ghosts of his past, from an old flame to a young man who announces his intention to kill Bill.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Nami and the Knight of the Sky team up to obliterate two bumbling, balloon-shaped bad guys, and God Eneru relies on his astounding invincibility to torment a noble Shandorian warrior.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unbeatable powers! Eneru's true form is revealed!

programme.title: Robins search for a mystical city of gold is interrupted by Yama, one of Enerus faithful servants. When the rampaging warrior destroys some ancient ruins, he provokes the wrath of Robins many fists of fury!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A mystical city! The grand ruins of shandora!

programme.title: Priest Ohm silences Chopper with an attack from which few if any ever recover. Meanwhile, Luffy begins to notice something strange about his cave-like prison, and four fearsome warriors prepare for battle!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: 0% survival rate! Chopper vs. Ohm, the sword wielding priest!

programme.title: Zoro, Gan Fall, Wyper, Ohm, and a prizefighting pooch gather for a ferocious free-for-all at the site of the Upper Ruins. While the battle rages, Luffy tries to punch his way out of the belly of a poisonous python!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Climb giant jack! Deadly combat in the upper ruins!

programme.title: Zoro and Wyper are out to beat down the same bad guys, but will they realize it soon enough to survive a white-barbed death match of doom? Deep in the belly of the python, Nami and Luffy enjoy what could be a short-lived reunion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ordeal of iron! White barbed death match!

programme.title: Eager to end their battle, Zoro aims the awesome destructive power of his 108 Caliber Phoenix at the sinister Priest Ohm! Elsewhere, god demands that Robin help him search for a legendary golden bell.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: God Eneru begins a deadly rampage aimed at exterminating the heavenly beings of Skypiea, and the ruins of Shandora become the scene of a bloody contest where survival is the name of the game.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Collapsing upper ruins! The quintet for the finale!

programme.title: Gan Fall, Wyper, Zoro, and Robin join forces for an attack on God Eneru. Despite their furious onslaught, the four warriors prove powerless to harm the thunderous deity until Wyper utilizes the power of a mystical stone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the ancient ruins! Sky god eneru's goal!

programme.title: God Eneru makes a shocking recovery from wounds that should have ended his reign of terror. Zoro and Wyper muster the strength for one final stand, and Nami must choose between her friends and survival.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ambition toward the endless vearth! The ark maxim!

programme.title: Luffy emerges from his serpentine tomb with one thing on his mind: revenge! As the rubber-man sets out to settle the score with God Eneru, Conis rushes to warn her people of their impending doom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: They finally clash! Pirate luffy vs. God eneru!

programme.title: As the citizens of the sky run for their lives, Eneru issues in the dawn of Deathpiea! Luffy is determined to stop the madman, but first he must discover a way to lay hands on the heinous holy man!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A handful of gold sends Luffy hurtling towards his death, Sanji and Usopp mount a midair rescue mission, and Nami prepares for an electrifying showdown with God Eneru!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy falls! Eneru's judgement and nami's wish!

programme.title: Usopp arrives just in time to save Nami from a lethal thunderbolt, but even their combined powers are no match for Eneru. While they scramble for an escape route, Sanji stealthily searches for a way to sabotage gods ark!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The two awaken! On the front lines of the burning love rescue!

programme.title: Despite being slowed by an arm encased in gold, Luffy races up a giant beanstalk on a mission to settle the score with Eneru! Elsewhere, the people of Skypiea feel the jolt of gods wrath!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Capriccio for despair! The impending doom of sky island!

programme.title: A flashback offers a glimpse at the lives of two legendary figures in Skypieas history: Montblanc Noland and the ferocious warrior Kalgara!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Led by a bell's sound! Tale of the great warrior and the explorer!

programme.title: The look back at the legend of Montblanc Noland and Kalgara the warrior continues with the story of how these two very different men suddenly found friendship and then lost it just as quickly!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Free from the spell! The great warrior sheds tears!

programme.title: Montblanc Noland and the warrior Kalgara succeed in settling their difference before parting ways, but the laws of nature and man conspire to keep them apart permanently!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eternal friends! The vowed bell echoes across the mighty seas!

programme.title: Eneru strikes Angel Island with a devastating lightning bolt, and Luffy continues his heroic climb up the giant beanstalk. The rubber-man refuses to stop until he rings the golden bell no matter what the cost!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Angel island obliterated! The horror of the raigo's advent!

programme.title: While Eneru continues his thunderous barrage, Nami hatches a plan to give Luffy one more shot at a grudge match with god. Zoros at the center of the scheme, but he might not survive his mission!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Knock over giant jack! Last hope for escape!

programme.title: Namis quick thinking gets Luffy closer to god, and the Straw Hat captain launches himself into the center of a sinister storm! Can he find a way to destroy Enerus looming cloud of death?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Miracle on skypiea! The love song heard in the clouds!

programme.title: In the aftermath of Luffys epic battle with Eneru, sunny skies chase away the storms, and the cloud-dwelling citizens of Angel Island turn their attention to rebuilding their homeland.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The battle ends! Proud fantasia echoes far!

programme.title: Robin attempts to decipher the riddle of a mysterious poneglyph, Usopp barters with the locals, and Luffy raids the priceless treasures of the legendary city of gold!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I made it here! The yarn the poneglyphs spin!

programme.title: With a little help from their new friends and a giant octopus the Straw Hats bid farewell to Skypiea and begin their descent back to the deep blue sea. Where theyll land is anyones guess!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Off to the blue sea! A heartfelt finale!

programme.title: After a frightening fall from the clouds, the Straw Hats find themselves trapped inside an impenetrable Marine stronghold. The crew gets separated, the Going Merry is impounded, and rumors of ghosts run rampant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A state of emergency is issued! A notorious pirate ship has infiltrated!

programme.title: While Nami searches for the Going Merry, Luffy and Sanji pose as famous chefs, only to end up competing in a cooking contest with a beautiful mistress of the galley!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji the cook! Proving his merit at the marine dining hall!

programme.title: Zoro is imprisoned and interrogated, and Choppers ill-chosen hiding spot lands him in the operating room along with a doctor who cant stand the sight of blood!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffys insatiable appetite betrays his true identity, and yet another member of his crew ends up in the brig when two Straw Hats try to fool Commander Jonathan with the same disguise!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The marine's dragnet closes in! The second member captured!

programme.title: Commander Jonathan sets a Straw Hat trap, but Luffy and Sanji are willing to risk it all to help spring their mates. Will a souvenir from the sky save the day or will their escape plan be scuttled by foul play?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy and sanji's daring rescue mission!

programme.title: Luffy and his gang make a break for the docks, and Commander Jonathan deploys armed guards in an attempt to slow down the Straw Hats. Only one thing is certain: somebody is going down for the count!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter the hot-blooded special forces! Battle on the bridge!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are surrounded, outnumbered, blasted with tear gas. Taking a pretty, young doctor hostage may be their only hope for surviving long enough for a Merry reunion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Breaking through the seige! The going merry is recovered!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew were almost in the clear when Nami made a horrifying discovery: the Marines stole their gold! Now, the Straw Hats must sail straight into the thick of the fight to reclaim their lost riches!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The pirate ship disappears! Fortress battle, round #2!

programme.title: Usopp hatches a plan for a moonlit raid on the Marine vault, but Commander Jonathan is has a nasty surprise waiting for the pirates! Meanwhile, Sanji and Nami attempt to recover the waver.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The gold and waver recovery operations!

programme.title: The extreme arrogance of a Marine special investigator clears a path for Luffy and company to make their escape! Unfortunately, the Straw Hats still have to find their gold before returning to the high seas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The one fell swoop plan! Jonathan's surefire secret tactic!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends go to have fun at the horse race track, but winning isn't as easy as stealing. Lupin notices two people who are winning big money hand over fist, and gets suspicious.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Catherine rescues Lupin and Jigen, who are pursued by Zenigata as usual. She's an old acquaintance of Jigen's, and provokes Jigen to steal a 140-karat diamond from her own mansion.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Wolf and Rose are a cool hitmen duo with the ambition of rising to the top of the hitman business by killing Lupin. They capture Goemon and torture him to confess about Lupin's weaknesses. Lupin learns that Goemon is in danger.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The chief of the police department accused of mismanagement on Lupin's release, hit the prime minister out of anger and was dismissed. Zenigata thinks that Lupin is the only arrest to avenge the chief's death, and starts an operation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The painting "The First Supper" hides clues to an heirloom that Christ received from Virgin Mary. This painting has been kept by the clan of Judah for generations, and a woman named Nova knows where the painting is hidden.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the First Supper

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Mona Lisa never leaves the Louvre Museum. Arsne Lupin tried unsuccessfully to steal her and Lupin III wants her for his collection, however, and fireworks ignite between him and Zenigata in charge of security.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On New Years Eve, Lupin is after is the Golden Treasure Ship at Mount Horai. It's said that the Seven Lucky Gods conferred this treasure, which is shown in public only once a year when the New Year's bell rings at the belfry of Kohoji Temple.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Lupin is tossed to and fro by Fujiko. But a man named Buckingham comes to him and sells him "disguise chewing gum" for 50,000 dollars.
programme.sub-title: The Strategy of the Chewing Gum Disguise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The island of Rabaul has many remains of Japanese casualties of the Pacific War. It's said that Captain Cook's secret treasure is hidden there, worth 1-billion pounds. Lupin and gang are after this treasure but they get attacked!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and gang break into the Bank of Stockholm but as usual, Fujiko tries to take the money all for herself. Lupin goes after her but she gets injured in an avalanche. She confesses to Lupin about the location of her most precious treasure

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends search a month for the pirate Kid's treasure, but they are thwarted by an underground organization called the Red Ghost. Knowing something is afoot, Lupin sends Fujiko and Goemon to investigate.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds a piece of paper in a silk hat, an heirloom of Arsne Lupin. It's information regarding an opal statue of Venus, and since Lupin figures its ownership is his birthright, he heads to Gregoire's castle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata acquires a pie-throwing gun, and is ordered to capture Lupin. Meanwhile, Lupin and Fujiko are discussing Napoleon's treasures. It's said that the key to solving the mystery of their whereabouts lies in a scarf made by Napoleon's assistant
programme.sub-title: An Unusual End to an Expedition for Napoleon's Treasure

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The young girl Francoise lives near Lupin; she watches Lupin and Fujiko talking, and falls for him. But her father scolds her and tells her to stay away from thieves, but Francoise devises a plan to approach Lupin anyway

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Professor Pancho has devoted his life to solving the problem of food supply. Lupin decides to help them out and invents a rocket that flies on corn fuel, thinking that maybe he and Fujiko will take a trip to the moon

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is blackmailed; Fujiko has been kidnapped, and for ransom he must steal a jeweled crown worth 100 million dollars. Lupin and friends head to the museum where their objective lies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lady Black and Fujiko have a bet. Whoever kills Lupin will get the loser's entire jewelry collection. Lady Black lures Lupin using Fujiko so she could kill him, but why is she so passionate about wanting him dead?
programme.sub-title: Take Lupin All The Way to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Boss Largo wants Lupin dead; Lupin had just stolen a bundle of the boss's casino profits. But no run of the mill hitman would suffice to wack Lupin. But Largo sees that Lupin is suffering from a toothache, and gets an idea.
programme.sub-title: The Direct Attack! Dead Ball Strategy

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin reads the morning paper, which says that Lupin stole a 100-karat diamond that was being used in a musical. He knows he didn't do it, so he asks Fujiko and others, but they too have no idea what it's all about.
programme.sub-title: Lupin and An Old Woman's Scheme

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The nation of Janaica is troubled with coup d'etats and revolutions, but Lupin, discovering that the president's mansion houses the missing painting "Nude Venus," decides to go scope the joint with Jigen.
programme.sub-title: The Kindness Of Jigen is Seen

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The master of surrealism, Monsieur Dar had spent three years working on his masterpiece, but news is out that the great object of art got stolen.
programme.sub-title: Lupin vs The Man of Two Faces

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Three incidents of bank robbery have happened; a total of 1.3 billion yen was stolen. A man calling himself Goemon is the culprit and he even sends Lupin a challenge, but Goemon wants to settle the score by himself.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of Goemon's Zantetsu Sword

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's stash of Napoleon's cash got stolen, but Lupin catches the culprit and tries to make him confess. Turns out he's only one of the followers of the Fandar cult, and heads to their holy land of Fandara.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin learns that a treasure trove lies in a volcano on Cleo Island, but it can only be reached when the mountain isn't spewing molten lava! He tries to convince Jigen and Goemon to join him but they're not interested.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko informs Lupin that fine quality diamonds from South Africa are stored in a safe of a global syndicate and importer of diamonds. Lupin makes his way as a worker in the boiler room, and steals the loot of diamonds.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds out about the jewel "Poison Trio" of the Borges family and decides to steal it after Fujiko goads him. Galdan, the nephew of Lucricia greets Lupin, and tells him that elderly Lucricia had been arrested and must be broken out of jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes on a safe-cracking rampage and rakes in 10 million francs. He needs the money to purchase the world's only rare Gold Butterfly at an auction. But Lupin drops the 10 million francs while on the run

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin scopes a jewelry museum where the billion-dollar gem Cleopatra's Tear is displayed. But Lupin can't get to it because the display case is secured by high-voltage electricity.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: No thief has ever succeeded in stealing the secret gem of Pompeii's nunnery; it's guarded by venomous snakes. Even Arsene Lupin gave up on it, since he hates snakes. But Lupin takes on the challenge. Will Lupin succeed? And what kind of secret gem is it?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though the tycoon Steel had replaced all his bodily organs with artificial organs to live, he's told that he only has a week to live. There is only one way he could prolong his life, which is to receive a brain transplant and he wants Lupin's Brain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous gourmand and field mice scientist Salmon Whitney is also known as being the chairman of a Canadian diamond mining operation. Lupin is after his diamonds, which will go on auction in Paris.
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Runs and the Pig Rolls

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Coaxed by Fujiko, Lupin decides to steal the diamond chandelier at the Kremlin Palace. He disguises himself as Zenigata and infiltrates the palace, but government police soldier Natasha captures him and throws him in the slammer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: England's Lord Weather provokes Lupin with a bet, and dares him to steal Red Arrow away from him. Lupin takes the challenge as it's a matter of pride, but Jigen wants no part of it because he and Weather are gambling buddies.

programme.title: Accident Man: Hitman's Holiday, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: A hit man must beat the top assassins in the world.

programme.title: Close Range, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: A rogue soldier turned outlaw is thrust into a relentless fight with a corrupt sheriff, his obedient deputies, and a dangerous drug cartel in order to protect his family.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Stealth, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: From the director of XXX and The Fast and The Furious comes an exhilarating epic blockbuster starring Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel and Academy Award Winner Jamie Foxx (Best Actor, RAY, 2004). rated -PG-13

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Legend of the Lost, (1957, Action)
programme.desc: Told against the sweeping panoramas of the Sahara desert, this epic features an exotic mix of action, suspense, and romance and delivers a caravan of excitement - with screen icons John Wayne and Sophia Loren fighting to survive an arduous journey!

programme.title: Another Pair of Aces, (1991, Western)
programme.desc: Starring Willie Nelson and Kris Kristofferson. A gambler, a Texas Ranger and an FBI agent investigate a series of vigilante murders.

programme.title: The Gambler, (1980, Western)
programme.desc: Kenny Rogers as The Gambler (1980) features the famed singer-songwriter in a tale of the Old West inspired by one of his most beloved songs.

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: John Huston directs Audrey Hepburn in this thrilling, romantic western about a woman who becomes the target of lawless racism and brutality when it is discovered that she was born to the Kiowa tribe but secretly adopted by a white frontier family.

programme.title: Five Guns To Tombstone, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.title: Fort Yuma, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: When a revered Apache chief is brutally murdered en route to Fort Yuma to negotiate a peace treaty, all-out war erupts in this rousing -- and surprisingly touching -- western starring Peter Graves and directed by the legendary Lesley Selander.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Action)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: Invitation to a Gunfighter, (1964, Western)
programme.desc: Screen legend Yul Brynner turns in a magnificent performance as a gunfighter who must do battle with his most formidable adversary - his own conscience - in this gripping, double-barreled western full of surprise twists and colorful villainy.

programme.title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: Frontier lawman Wyatt Earp joins his three brothers in their feud against the villainous Clanton gang, a local clan of cattle thieves in Tombstone, Arizona.

programme.title: The Girl Next Door, (2004, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A driven high school senior with political aspirations falls in love with the seemingly perfect girl-next-door, only to discover that she's a porn star.

programme.title: Clerks II, (2006, Screwball)
programme.desc: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons, but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire. Sequel to the 1994 film by Kevin Smith.

programme.title: Clerks III, (2022, Screwball)
programme.desc: Following a massive heart attack, Randal enlists his friends and fellow clerks Dante, Elias, Jay, and Silent Bob to make a movie immortalizing his life at the convenience store that started it all.

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno, (2008, Screwball)
programme.desc: In order to resolve their financial woes, lifelong platonic friends Zack and Miri decide to produce a porno film.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: Astonishing revelations about a top-secret wing of the U.S. military come to light when a reporter encounters an enigmatic Special Forces operator on a mind-boggling mission.

programme.title: Snatch, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A diamond heist gone haywire launches gangsters, bookies, and a dog on a rollicking ride through the rugged world of bare-knuckle boxing in search of the missing stone. Critically acclaimed comedy from Guy Richie.

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk, (2003, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: For many years a mysterious monk with no name (Chow Yun-Fat) has zigzagged the globe to protect an ancient scroll -- a scroll that holds the key to unlimited power. Now the Monk must look for a new scrollkeeper.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Conflict with the Saviors leads to unintended consequences for the Hilltop, the Kingdom, and Alexandria; morality proves tricky in wartime.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A new weapon in the Savior arsenal proves to be a giant hurdle as fighting continues between Rick's forces and those of the Saviors.

programme.title: A close look at Negan and the lives of the Saviors during the conflict through a familiar set of eyes.

programme.title: A Possesso de Mary
programme.desc: David (Gary Oldman) um capito de colarinho azul que luta para melhorar a vida de sua famlia. Estranhamente atrado por um navio abandonado que est em leilo, David impulsivamente compra o barco, acreditando que ser o bilhete de sua famlia para a felicidade e a prosperidade. Mas logo depois que eles embarcam em sua jornada inaugural, eventos estranhos e assustadores comeam a aterrorizar David e sua famlia, fazendo com que se voltem um contra o outro e duvidem de sua prpria sanidade.

programme.title: Em Campo Minado
programme.desc: Em setembro de 2006 no Afeganisto, trs jovens soldados britnicos so enviados para dispersar um bloqueio Talib, mas ao passarem pelo leito de um rio, um dos patrulheiros pisa em uma mina, deixada pela ocupao russa 25 anos atrs. Seus colegas pedem ajuda para resgatar o rapaz, que pode morrer ou ficar gravemente ferido. Mas logo que o reforo chega, eles descobrem que esto cercados por minas e que qualquer movimento em falso pode ser fatal.

programme.desc: Seculo XVIII. Caroline Mathilde e uma jovem britanica que se torna rainha da Dinamarca apos se casar com o insano rei ChrisPan VII. programme.title: Gnesis - A Criao e o Dilvio

programme.title: Ningum Ama Ningum Por Mais de Dois Anos
programme.desc: Com uma narrativa bem-humorada, o filme mostra a histria de cinco casais que vivem, paralelamente, no incio da dcada de 60 no Brasil.

programme.title: Interligados
programme.desc: Um homem, que se culpa pela morte da sua filha nica, retorna cidade onde o fatdico acidente ocorreu. L, ele conhece uma bela e misteriosa mulher. Ambos sentem-se atrados um pelo outro, mas ela tambm carrega um passado sombrio.

programme.title: Original Gangster
programme.desc: Conhea a diferente vida de Castor: rfo quando criana, forado a sobreviver no deserto, at crescer e chegar a Londres, onde se tornou um dos principais chefes do submundo do crime.

programme.desc: Naruto: Comer Ou Ser Comido - Pnico Na Floresta - S1E28

programme.desc: Naruto: Formao De Batalha: Ino-Shika-Cho - S1E33

programme.title: Quando Naruto e seu time chegam a torre e abrem os dois pergaminhos, Iruka aparece e explica o esprito do ninja chunin (nvel mdio) aos estudantes da Academia Ninja. Agora ele confia em Naruto e seu time. Anko fala com o Hokage sobre Orochimaru.

programme.desc: Naruto: Estreitando O Campo, Morte Sbita, Eliminao! - S1E38

programme.title: Luffy tenta resgatar seus companheiros, mas acaba caindo na armadilha de cores de Miss Golden Week!
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E14

programme.title: Usopp e Luffy lutam contra a Baroque Works para salvar Zoro, Nami e Vivi! Enquanto isso, Sanji segue separado do grupo.
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E15

programme.title: Luffy e os demais precisam se despedir da ilha dos gigantes Brogy e Dorry e seguir para a terra natal de Vivi, o Reino de Alabasta, ameaado por uma guerra civil!
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E16

programme.title: Aps partirem da ilha dos gigantes, os Chapus de Palha agora precisam lidar com uma sbita doena que acomete Nami, e pode ser letal caso no achem um mdico!
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E17

programme.title: Luffy e os Chapus de Palha so atacados por Wapol de Lato, e precisam deter a ameaa e seguir em busca de um mdico que cure Nami!
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E18

programme.title: Luffy e os Chapus de Palha no tm recepo calorosa na prxima ilha da Grand Line, mas precisam convencer os habitantes de que precisam de um mdico para Nami. O que a nova ilha, porm, possui, uma bruxa!
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E19

programme.title: Luffy e Sanji seguem com Nami ao encontro da mdica de Big Horn, mas Dalton, Vivi e Usopp descobrem que eles seguiram em vo, pois a mdica est em outra vila!
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E20

programme.title: Wapol e seus homens voltam a Drum em busca de retomar seu reinado de terror. Mas Dalton no quer ver o retorno da tirania. Enquanto isso, a avalanche na montanha de neve pode engolir a cidade!
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E21

programme.title: Luffy no desiste de conseguir o tratamento para Nami com a Dra. Kureha, e agora levar no s a navegadora, mas tambm Sanji, atingido pela avalanche, ao topo da montanha.
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E22

programme.title: Luffy e Sanji querem cozinhar Chopper, a rena de nariz azul que acompanha a Dra. Kureha. Mas a mdica que salvou Nami revela o triste passado da estranha criatura.
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E23

programme.title: A Doutorina conta a Nami e Sanji sobre Hiluluk, o mdico charlato que tratou Chopper quando o mesmo estava beira da morte.
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E24

programme.title: O destino de Hiluluk revelado e Wapol chega ao castelo onde Luffy e os demais se encontram!
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E25

programme.title: Luffy e os demais esto frente a frente com Wapol e seus capangas! O outrora rei tirano de Drum deseja recuperar seu domnio e, para isso, est disposto a mostrar todo o poder do seu Fruto do Diabo!
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E26

programme.title: Chopper enfrenta Chessmarimo e mostra o segredo por trs das sete formas da Fruta da Forma Humana!
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E27

programme.title: Luffy est em seu confronto final com Wapol, mas Dalton decide que Drum precisa ruir, custe o que custar, e recomear do zero. Para isso, capaz de uma medida drstica!
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E28

programme.title: Chopper precisa decidir se vai ou no se aliar aos Chapus de Palha, o que significar deixar Drum, a terra onde conheceu a Doutorina e Hiluluk, de cujo sonho herdeiro.
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E29

programme.title: Chopper torna-se membro dos Chapus de Palha, entende melhor a histria do bando e ruma com os demais para Alabasta, a terra de Vivi.
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E30

programme.title: Crocodile entra em ao para deter piratas que invadem Alabasta e ovacionado pelo povo. E Luffy e os demais tm um encontro inesperado com Bon Clay a bordo!
programme.desc: One Piece - S2E31

programme.title: Jaspion se depara com o monstro Namaguederaz, um monstro pacfico que foi atingido por uma flecha venenosa. O menino Koko, que convive com o monstro, revela que s a fruta da vida pode salv-lo.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E3

programme.title: Edin acha que a Terra, por ter sido antigamente habitada por vrios monstros, seria um alvo em potencial de Satan Goss.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E4

programme.title: A jovem Satomi, em sua escola, teve vises de um monstro. Por causa disso, ela se assusta e chama a ateno da aula toda.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E5

programme.title: Crianas de uma vila local encontram um filhote de monstro. MacGaren e sua quadrilha, disfarados, levam o monstrinho. Jaspion ajuda as crianas a recuperarem o filhote, mas MacGaren contra ataca.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E6

programme.title: Quatro jovens desaparecem misteriosamente numa trilha pelas montanhas. Anri encontra Jaspion e explica sobre os misteriosos desaparecimentos no "Monte Uivante".
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E7

programme.title: Boomerman pede ajuda para Jaspion e avisa que dois membros da quadrilha de MacGaren desertaram, e por isso so perseguidos sob pena de morte. Eles so Rod e Satie. Um casal de fugitivos que foi enganado por falsas promessas de MacGaren.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E8

programme.title: Jaspion, Anri e Miya esto na floresta. De repente escutam um canto que vem de uma rvore de cedro. Jaspion conversa com a rvore e descobre que ela ser derrubada. Macgaren sugere a seu pai Satan Goss que transforme a rvore em um monstro.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E9

programme.title: Crianas de uma vila local encontram um filhote de monstro. MacGaren e sua quadrilha, disfarados, levam o monstrinho. Jaspion ajuda as crianas a recuperarem o filhote, mas MacGaren contra ataca.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E10

programme.title: Quatro cientistas esto no caminho da cidade tecnolgica de Tsukuba em uma lancha pelo rio. Quando voltam esto com os cabelos brancos, alm disso comeam a agir violentamente.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E11

programme.title: A profecia da Bblia Galctica cita a existncia de um emprstimo passado dourado que ajudou um heri a derrotar Satan Goss. Macgaren escraviza o povo de uma aldeia em busca do pssaro.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E12

programme.title: Chegando da Galxia, os renegados espaciais "Quadridemos" com um nico objetivo: destruir Jaspion.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E13

programme.title: O garoto Katsuya tira uma foto de um monstro no lago. Jaspion vai investigar o misterioso lago.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E14

programme.title: O Professor Nanbara captura em uma foto a imagem do emprstimo passo dourado. Jaspion investiga o que aconteceu, mas Macgaren e Iki esto espera.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E15

programme.title: Kanoko e Kenta fogem da fazenda de Rod e Satie. Jaspion vai atrs das crianas. Enquanto isso, Zampa, Purima e Goru junto com os soldados de MacGaren vm raptar pessoas.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E16

programme.title: Surge o Deus Jirai, que se manifestou para defender Toha da famlia de Feitceiros que invocou o monstro gigante Yonma. Deus Jirai seria a entidade protetora de Jiraiya? Algo extraordinrio est para acontecer! Lute Jiraiya!
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E35

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E36

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E37

programme.title: A famlia de Feiticeiros mais uma vez tentar exterminar Jiraya e resgatado por seus amigos. Morgana retorna e se rene com Dokosai para encontrar Pako e destruir o Deus Jirai.

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E39
